review: If you don't have Amazon Prime you are kind of limited on free viewing options
author: Edwin G.

review: We have enjoyed the fire stick so far. We have been watching Prime movies and old television shows. Great to have when nothing on tv catches your eye.
author: Elizabeth

review: Love it!!!  Met my expectations and more! Best 40 ever spent!
author: Melissa Colas

review: The fire stick works great and was a quick install. Just make sure you have a free HDMI port on your TV.
author: David

review: HBO Go would be a nice feature.
author: Michelle G. Tierce

review: Still trying to work at it. I'm trying to find free movies and shows. The whole point of getting this was to cancel cable but now I'm second guessing
author: Amazon Customer

review: Not just plug and play.besides that, it meets my expectations.I highly recommend it.
author: reggie

review: I LOVE MINE!!!!  Since I got it, I have stopped watching regular TV!  I am hooked!  Fire TV Stick is a chauffeur's best friend!
author: Curtis
